name: Herald of Blood
description: The Herald of Blood is a formidable fiend with a large, imposing presence, exuding malevolence. Its body is designed for combat, with durable features that hint at its significant power and resilience.
memorable: This creature can deal powerful necrotic damage and it thrives in melee combat, punishing attackers and manipulating their own rage against them.
goals: To inflict devastation on its enemies and assert its dominance in combat.
relations: Often seen alongside other fiends or as a commander of lesser minions that share its malevolent nature.
environment: Typically found in dark, foreboding locations such as cursed ruins, vast battlefields, or layers of the lower planes.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution make it a formidable combatant, with abilities to deal and withstand significant damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can counteract its many immunities.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee strikes with its staff, as well as a devastating Blood Bolt that targets creatures from afar, inflicting necrotic damage and potentially poisoning foes.
most_powerful_ability: Call Blood, which deals massive area-of-effect necrotic damage and grants the Herald temporary hit points from the damage dealt.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 240 feet and has a passive perception of 17, enhancing its awareness of surroundings.
skills: Skilled in Arcana, showcasing its magical knowledge and abilities, along with good perception skills.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage
Can grapple and restrain smaller foes
Grants rage to weaken opponents while empowering them
Increases its Armor Class when struck in melee
test_queries: menacing huge fiend with necrotic attacks
creature that gains strength while attacking
formidable opponent with powerful Blood Bolt
fiend that can grapple and restrain enemies
monster that inflicts exhaustion on foes
